values.value:
For orders placed within the United States, we accept returns within 45 days after you receive shipping confirmation.

For orders shipped to Canada, we accept returns within 45 days after shipping confirmation.

All returns are free. In order to accept your return, items must be unworn with tags attached. Footwear must be unworn and include its original shoebox without post labels.

Please note, items marked FINAL SALE are not eligible for returns, refunds, exchanges or credits.

Click here to start a return.

For orders placed within the United States, we accept returns within 90 days after you receive shipping confirmation.

For orders shipped to Canada, we accept returns within 90 days after shipping confirmation.

All returns are free. In order to accept your return, items must be unworn with tags attached. Footwear must be unworn and include its original shoebox without post labels.

Please note, items marked FINAL SALE are not eligible for returns, refunds, exchanges or credits.

Click here to start a return.
